sku.description: The SKU of the Kusto cluster.

zones.description: The availability zones of the cluster.

properties.description: Properties supplied to the Database Create Or Update Kusto operation.
Properties supplied to the Data Connection Create Or Update Kusto operation.

name.description: SKU name. Possible values include: 'D14_v2', 'D13_v2', 'L16', 'L8', 'Standard_DS13_v2+1TB_PS', 'Standard_DS13_v2+2TB_PS', 'Standard_DS14_v2+3TB_PS', 'Standard_DS14_v2+4TB_PS', 'Dev(No SLA)_Standard_D11_v2'

Zones.description: An array represents the availability zones of the cluster.

enableDiskEncryption.description: A boolean value that indicates if the cluster's disks are encrypted.

enableStreamingIngest.description: A boolean value that indicates if streaming ingest is enabled.

ClusterProperties.description: Class representing the Kusto cluster properties.

softDeletePeriod.description: The time the data should be kept before it stops being accessible to queries in TimeSpan.

hotCachePeriod.description: The time the data should be kept in cache for fast queries in TimeSpan.

DatabaseProperties.description: Class representing the Kusto database properties.

EventHubDataConnection.description: Information about the event hub data connection

kind.description: Kind of the endpoint for the data connection

EventHubDataConnectionProperties.description: Class representing the Kusto event hub connection properties.

eventHubResourceId.description: The resource ID of the event hub to be used to create a data connection.

tableName.description: The table where the data should be ingested. Optionally the table information can be added to each message.

mappingRuleName.description: The mapping rule to be used to ingest the data. Optionally the mapping information can be added to each message.

dataFormat.description: The data format of the message. Optionally the data format can be added to each message.

IotHubDataConnection.description: Information about the Iot hub data connection

kind.description: Kind of the endpoint for the data connection

IotHubDataConnectionProperties.description: Class representing the Kusto Iot hub connection properties.

IotHubResourceId.description: The resource ID of the iot hub to be used to create a data connection.

tableName.description: The table where the data should be ingested. Optionally the table information can be added to each message.

mappingRuleName.description: The mapping rule to be used to ingest the data. Optionally the mapping information can be added to each message.

dataFormat.description: The data format of the message. Optionally the data format can be added to each message.

sharedAccessPolicyName.description: The name of the shared access policy.

EventGridDataConnection.description: Information about the event grid data connection

kind.description: Kind of the endpoint for the data connection

EventGridDataConnectionProperties.description: Class representing the Kusto event grid connection properties.

storageAccountResourceId.description: The resource ID of the storage account where the data resides.

eventHubResourceId.description: The resource ID where the event grid is configured to send events.

tableName.description: The table where the data should be ingested. Optionally the table information can be added to each message.

mappingRuleName.description: The mapping rule to be used to ingest the data. Optionally the mapping information can be added to each message.

dataFormat.description: The data format of the message. Optionally the data format can be added to each message.

DataFormat.description: The data format of the message. Optionally the data format can be added to each message.

version.description: The version of the template defined, for instance 1.

isEnabled.description: A boolean value that indicate if the optimized autoscale feature is enabled or not.

OptimizedAutoscale.description: A class that contains the optimized auto scale definition.

enginePublicIpId.description: Engine service's public IP address resource id.

dataManagementPublicIpId.description: Data management's service public IP address resource id.

VirtualNetworkConfiguration.description: A class that contains virtual network definition.
